T02D1854:17b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1854:17b-5: dpal ldan ral gri las byung gur gum mdog / zhi ba'i zhal gsum phyag ni drug ldan zhing //
T02D1854:17b-6: shes rab kyis 'khyud chu skyes la bzhugs pa'i //
T02D1854:17b-7: dpal ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1854:17b-8: dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rim pa'i gzhung lugs kyi //
T02D1854:17b-9: sgrub thabs bdag nyid dran phyir brtsam par bya //
T02D1854:17b-10: 'jam dbyangs bde bar rtogs pa'i don du ni //
T02D1854:17b-11: rtogs pa'i nga rgyal bde ba dang bral ba //
T02D1854:17b-12: sgra yi tshogs kyi sdeb sbyor bral dgongs pa //
T02D1854:17b-13: sbas rnams slob dpon zhabs kyis 'gro don du //
T02D1854:17b-14: gsal bar sgra ji bzhin du bshad don du //
T02D1854:17b-15: sde ba sbyor yang shing mtshan nyid dang bral zhing //
T02D1854:17b-16: gang yang don zab tshad mas shin tu sbas //
T02D1854:17b-17: blo dman rnams kyis de rtogs mi 'gyur ba'i //
T02D1854:17b-18: dpal ldan ye shes zhal bshad sgrub thabs kyi ;
T02D1854:17b-19: / man ngag shin tu gsal bas bshad par bya //
T02D1854:17b-20: 'bad pa chen pos bla ma mnyes byas te //
T02D1854:17b-21: shin tu sdug sogs khyad 'phags sbyin pa dang //
T02D1854:17b-22: gzhan yang mchog tu gyur pas mchod byas na //
T02D1854:17b-23: 'dir ni 'dod pa'i bka' drin ster par 'gyur //
T02D1854:17b-24: chu yi dbang dang cod pan ming dang ni //
T02D1854:17b-25: rdo rje dril bu zhes ni bshad pa dang //
T02D1854:17b-26: bum pa zhes bya mchog tu gsang ba dang //
T02D1854:17b-27: shes rab zhes bya lung bstan brtul zhugs dang //
T02D1854:17b-28: dbugs dbyung de rnams chog ji lta bar //
T02D1854:17b-29: rjes gnang thob cing bla ma 'jam dbyangs dang //
T02D1854:17b-30: sngags pas bsrung ba'i thabs dang dam tshig dang //
T02D1854:18a-1: pa la gnas mngon ldan pa //
T02D1854:18a-2: yang dag thob cing sa phyogs gtsang mnyam pa //
T02D1854:18a-3: yid du 'ong zhing chu yis chag chag btab //
T02D1854:18a-4: dri bzang nyi zla chu dang sman rnams kyis //
T02D1854:18a-5: rab byugs me tog chal bar bkram pa dang //
T02D1854:18a-6: gla rtsi gur kum tsandan gyis mdzes pa //
T02D1854:18a-7: yang na sems kyis 'dir ni rnam par bsam //
T02D1854:18a-8: bde ba'i stan la rdo rje skyil krung bcas //
T02D1854:18a-9: sems can la brtse ting 'dzin dang por bsgom //
T02D1854:18a-10: ji srid pa 'di sangs rgyas ma lus gyur //
T02D1854:18a-11: de srid bdag gis skyil krung gzhig mi bya //
T02D1854:18a-12: ma lus 'gro tshogs sangs rgyas rnam bya zhes //
T02D1854:18a-13: de ltar smon lam khyad 'phags gdab par bya //
T02D1854:18a-14: 'gro ba rgyu dang mi rgyu thams cad dang //
T02D1854:18a-15: rang lus stong pa nyid du bsgom bya ste //
T02D1854:18a-16: rang lus lha yi ngo bo 'od gsal ba //
T02D1854:18a-17: rang gi sems tsam las byung blta bar bya //
T02D1854:18a-18: gang yang 'di ltar yi ge aom dang por //
T02D1854:18a-19: sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dha rma sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham gsang sngags rgyal //
T02D1854:18a-20: mthar thug brjod cing 'dir yang de 'og tu //
T02D1854:18a-21: rang gi snying gar aa las zla ba bsgom //
T02D1854:18a-22: de dkyil 'od zer tshogs ni ser po mam //
T02D1854:18a-23: khams gsum mun pa'i tshogs ni 'joms byed pa //
T02D1854:18a-24: rnam thar rnam gsum gyi sgo dag par 'gyur //
T02D1854:18a-25: aom sh'u n+ya t'a zhes dang por rnam par thar //
T02D1854:18a-26: gzhan ni aa ni mitta zhes su bshad //
T02D1854:18a-27: aom aa pra ni dhi tam sgra de rnams //
T02D1854:18a-28: 'dir bdag ye shes la sogs zhal gsum 'dod //
T02D1854:18a-29: des ni lha mi'i dag pa thob gyur nas //
T02D1854:18a-30: de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong //
T02D1854:18a-31: sna tshogs gzhal yas khang byas dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D1854:18a-32: bla ma mgon po nam mkha' la gnas mchod //
T02D1854:18a-33: snying po'i sa bon gyis spros 'od zer tshegs //
T02D1854:18a-34: las byung gzugs sogs dgu po'i bdag nyid dang //
T02D1854:18a-35: me tog la sogs phyi rol rang gi mgon //
T02D1854:18a-36: 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyis mchod bsam //
T02D1854:18a-37: rdzogs sangs 'khor lo'i spyan sngar sa la ni //
T02D1854:18a-38: pus btsugs dman pa'i sems kyis thal sbyar byas //
T02D1854:18a-39: dkyil 'khor mgon po mchod pas rab mchod cing //
T02D1854:18a-40: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs brjod par bya //
T02D1854:18a-41: bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang //
T02D1854:18a-42: chags dang zhe sdang rnam par rmongs pa yis //
T02D1854:18b-0: srid pa nyam pa rnams su sdig bgyis @18b pa ;
T02D1854:18b-1: / des na sdig de thams cad rab tu bshags //
T02D1854:18b-3: sngon chad byas pa'i sdig pa bshags nas kyang //
T02D1854:18b-4: slar yang de la 'jug par mi bgyid cing //
T02D1854:18b-5: byang chub snying po la gnas gyur gyi bar //
T02D1854:18b-6: rtag tu bdag gi bsod nams blo ldan shog / sdom pa'o //
T02D1854:18b-7: rdzogs sangs rgyas mgon byang chub sems dpa' mchog /'phags pa gzhan gyis dge ba gang bgyis pa //
T02D1854:18b-8: de la'ang bdag ni byang chub 'bras thob par //
T02D1854:18b-9: ma lus pa la bdag ni rjes yi rang //
T02D1854:18b-11: legs par gsungs chus bran pa'i bsod nams kyi //
T02D1854:18b-12: myug ni bdag gis rim thob 'phel ba yis //
T02D1854:18b-13: 'khor ba'i gdung bas bcom pa'i 'gro rnams la //
T02D1854:18b-14: yang dag byang chub shing mchog 'bras bcas 'gyur //
T02D1854:18b-16: rdzogs sangs rin chen rang gi sems gnas dang //
T02D1854:18b-17: rtog pa'i dra ba rab tu rnam bral chos //
T02D1854:18b-18: sa dbang tshogs dang brtul zhugs dbang dge 'dun //
T02D1854:18b-19: rab tu dad pas rtag tu skyabs su mchi //
T02D1854:18b-20: gsum la skyabs su mchi ba'o //
T02D1854:18b-21: sdug bsngal tshogs kyis bsregs pa'i sems can kun //
T02D1854:18b-22: snying rje ldan las byung kun gtong ba ni //
T02D1854:18b-23: dam chos chu char rab bsregs 'joms pa yis //
T02D1854:18b-24: sangs rgyas sgrub ces rang sems bskyed par bya //
T02D1854:18b-25: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o //
T02D1854:18b-26: sbyin pa la sogs bya bas skabs byas te //
T02D1854:18b-27: 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun gyi lam //
T02D1854:18b-28: gshegs dang gshegs 'gyur 'jig rten 'das pa yi //
T02D1854:18b-29: dpal 'bras lam mchog de la brten par bgyi //
T02D1854:18b-31: rgyal dang bdag nyid las skyes de rnams la //
T02D1854:18b-32: kun nas kun du bdag nyid bdag gis dbul //
T02D1854:18b-33: sems dpa' mchog gis bdag nyid yongs gzung bas //
T02D1854:18b-34: dad pas khyod la 'bangs su mchi bar bgyi //
T02D1854:18b-36: glo bur nyon mongs tshogs chen gyis gdungs pa //
T02D1854:18b-37: bskyod pa'i skye bo mtha' med dgrol ba'i phyir //
T02D1854:18b-38: chos kyi bdud rtsi sngags rnams bshad pa ru //
T02D1854:18b-39: sman mchog mgon po la ni bdag bskul lo //
T02D1854:18b-41: mchog tu mi dge bsam pas rab bcom pa'i //
T02D1854:18b-42: bdud kyi skye rga na dang 'chi ba las //
T02D1854:19a-2: mgon mchog bzhugs par bdag ni gsol ba 'debs //
T02D1854:19a-4: tshigs bcad rdzogs byas legs zhes brjod nas ni //
T02D1854:19a-5: thub dbang tshogs rnams de nas mi snang gyur //
T02D1854:19a-6: h'um bsgoms nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni /
T02D1854:19a-7: nam mkha' aa dza na ri'i mdog ldan pa //
T02D1854:19a-8: de byung sna tshogs rdo rje nyi dkyil gnas //
T02D1854:19a-9: de las gtso bo'i sa bon 'od ldan pa //
T02D1854:19a-10: de las sna tshogs rdo rje'i sprin tshogs kyis //
T02D1854:19a-11: phyogs rnams thams cad char gyis yongs su gang //
T02D1854:19a-12: de las phyogs brgyad rdo rje'i rang bzhin char //
T02D1854:19a-13: rang 'bab de yis dra bar sprul bar dmigs //
T02D1854:19a-14: das ni sa bdun 'og la sogs 'phel nas //
T02D1854:19a-15: srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du mda' rnams so //
T02D1854:19a-16: steng gi sa bon gyur pas skad cig la //
T02D1854:19a-17: sna tshogs rdo rje yi ni bla re byung //
T02D1854:19a-18: 'od zer de tshogs mda' dang 'dra ba yis //
T02D1854:19a-19: nam mkha' khyab par kun du gdugs su gyur //
T02D1854:19a-20: yam las byung ba'i rlung ni 'og tu bsam //
T02D1854:19a-21: gzhur byas 'od sngon rgyal mtshan gyis ni mtshan //
T02D1854:19a-22: bhee ram ba zhes bya ba dum bu min //
T02D1854:19a-23: 'gro ba'i snying po 'dzin 'gyur gzhag par bya //
T02D1854:19a-24: dbus su gru gsum 'bar ba rab 'bar ba //
T02D1854:19a-25: ram gyis bon las byung phyogs gzhu 'dren //
T02D1854:19a-26: mthong nas de yi dbus su mtshams bcing bya //
T02D1854:19a-27: bam dkar las byung ba yi bum mtshan chu //
T02D1854:19a-28: de dbus lam las byung ba'i mdog ser po //
T02D1854:19a-29: ra ba'i don du gru bzhi dbang gi'o //
T02D1854:19a-30: h'um gis sna tshogs rdo rje byas sa phyogs //
T02D1854:19a-31: de dbus ra bar rnal 'byor pa yis bya //
T02D1854:19a-32: 'di ni zhing rnams rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1854:19a-33: bhr'um ser las byung 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'i ;
T02D1854:19a-34: / rtse mo'i 'od zer phyogs bcur spro bar bya //
T02D1854:19a-35: rtsibs rnams thams cad kyi ni lte ba'i phyogs //
T02D1854:19a-36: pam byung padma'i steng du ram skyes nyi //
T02D1854:19a-37: legs gsungs rgyal ba rnams kyi skyed byed yum //
T02D1854:19a-38: bhr'um byung ye shes rnams ni gang yin nyid //
T02D1854:19a-39: sdug bsngal la sogs bcu gcig rnams kyi phyir //
T02D1854:19a-40: nyi ma nyi ma'i steng du h'um dgod bya //
T02D1854:19a-41: ye shes bcu gcig bcas 'dir 'khor lo la //
T02D1854:19a-42: nyi ma la gnas h'um byung rdo rje sngo //
T02D1854:19a-43: lte ba'i padma nyid byung rdo rje las //
T02D1854:19a-44: dpal ldan rdo rje h'um mdzad sku ru gyur //
T02D1854:19a-45: yan lag kun ni dbu ma'i zhal dang 'dra //
T02D1854:19a-46: g-yas pa dkar zhing g-yon pa'i zhal yang dmar //
T02D1854:19b-0: shin tu 'jigs @19b pa'i phyag drug 'jigs pa'i spyan //
T02D1854:19b-1: 'jigs pa'i bskal ba'i sprin 'dra sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D1854:19b-2: rig ma kun du bzang mos yang dag 'khyud //
T02D1854:19b-3: phyag gnyis kyis ni yan lag yongs su sdom //
T02D1854:19b-4: g-yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1854:19b-5: zhags pa lcags kyu lag pa g-yon gnyis 'dzin //
T02D1854:19b-6: g-yas pas au ma'i nu ma'i dkyil mnan cing //
T02D1854:19b-7: g-yon pas bde 'byung dregs pa'i mgo bo gnon //
T02D1854:19b-8: de bzhin zhabs kyi g-yas brkyang bzlog pa yis //
T02D1854:19b-9: gnas pa'i mgon po sku ni rab tu sgeg / rtsibs re re la nyi ma bcu gnas pa'i //
T02D1854:19b-10: h'um byung mtshan ma 'dzin pa spro bar bya //
T02D1854:19b-11: bsdus nas tho ba dbyug pa padma dang //
T02D1854:19b-12: rdo rje de rnams dbang sogs phyogs gnas bskyed //
T02D1854:19b-13: bskor phyogs su ni lcags kyu dbyug pa mdung //
T02D1854:19b-14: rdo rje me la sogs pa'i mtshams su bskyed //
T02D1854:19b-15: 'khor lo dgra sta gnyis ni steng 'og tu //
T02D1854:19b-16: skyed par byed de khro bo'i zhal ljang dgod //
T02D1854:19b-17: gshin rje mthar byed gzhan gyis mi thub dang //
T02D1854:19b-18: rta gdong bgegs kyi tshogs ni rnam par 'joms //
T02D1854:19b-19: takki dbyig sngon dang ni stobs po che //
T02D1854:19b-20: khro bo mi g-yo gtsug tor gnod mdzes rgyal //
T02D1854:19b-21: gnyis ni dkar po rta gdong dmar po ste //
T02D1854:19b-22: de bzhin gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ser po //
T02D1854:19b-23: bdun po gzhan dag kyang ni shin tu sngo //
T02D1854:19b-24: kun kyang nyi ma'i dkyil gnas rab tu grags //
T02D1854:19b-25: g-yas pa'i pus mo'i tshig ni shin tu bskums //
T02D1854:19b-26: g-yon pa'i brla dang rje ngar gnyis rab brkyang //
T02D1854:19b-27: sna tshogs padma nyi ma'i steng du gnas //
T02D1854:19b-28: phyogs dbang lus ni ji lta ba bzhin mnan //
T02D1854:19b-29: bee ta dzi t'i khro gnyer ral pa gcig / gha na skul byed ser bzang mchog chen po //
T02D1854:19b-30: mudha zhags pa gshin rje mthar byed sogs //
T02D1854:19b-31: de rnams bcu po mnyam du lha mo bsten //
T02D1854:19b-32: 'khor lo'i gtso dang gtsug tor gnod mdzes dang //
T02D1854:19b-33: de bzhin mi g-yo 'dod pa'i rgyal po lnga //
T02D1854:19b-34: sma ra med cing de rnams cod pan ldan //
T02D1854:19b-35: yan lag rin chen rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan //
T02D1854:19b-36: shin tu mdzes pa'i 'od sngon gyen du 'byung //
T02D1854:19b-37: khro dang bcas par bzhad pa'i zhal gsum ni //
T02D1854:19b-38: mche ba cung zad gtsigs shing spyan rnams dmar //
T02D1854:19b-39: shin tu mig zlum mi g-yo ba la sogs //
T02D1854:19b-40: yangs lta brda bstan chos kun 'jigs med pa'o //
T02D1854:19b-41: gshin rje mthar byed gzhan gyis mi thub pa //
T02D1854:20a-0: @20a * // dbyig sngon dang ni de bzhin rta mgrin dang //
T02D1854:20a-1: stobs po che dang bgegs mthar byed bcas pa'i //
T02D1854:20a-2: drug po mig ser gzhan yang shin tu drag / drag por blta bas sdang ba thams cad 'dul //
T02D1854:20a-3: gsus pa 'phyang zhing thung la mig kyang zlum //
T02D1854:20a-4: shin tu lce bskyod khro gnyer 'jigs la drag / smin ma g-yo zhing spyan bgrad zhal mche gtsigs //
T02D1854:20a-5: khros pas rnam 'jigs ha ha zhes bzhad pa //
T02D1854:20a-6: smin ma sma ra ser zhing skra ser skya //
T02D1854:20a-7: cod pan med cing rus pa sbrul gyis brgyan //
T02D1854:20a-8: rked pa'i phyogs su stag gi pags pa mnabs //
T02D1854:20a-9: skad cig gis ni 'gro ba za mthur ldan //
T02D1854:20a-10: drag po 'di rnams mgon po'i cod pan ni //
T02D1854:20a-11: rigs ldan dang ni mtha' yas mdog gnag gyur //
T02D1854:20a-12: 'jog po zhes klu gser gyi mdog 'dra ba //
T02D1854:20a-13: de bzhin du ni rna cha dag tu 'gyur //
T02D1854:20a-14: de bzhin padma zhes gser btso ma'i mdog /'di rnams kyis mdzes mgul pa'i do shal gyur //
T02D1854:20a-15: stobs rgyu padma'i rtsa ba 'dra dkar ba //
T02D1854:20a-16: thugs rje ldan pa rnams kyi mchod phyir thogs //
T02D1854:20a-17: padma dmar pa 'dra ba'i nor rgyas bu //
T02D1854:20a-18: 'og pag dag gi rgyu ru bcing byas te //
T02D1854:20a-19: dung dang padma dmar dang dkar ba gnyis //
T02D1854:20a-20: pad 'dra padma'i rkang gdub gnyis su byas //
T02D1854:20a-21: g-yas phyogs su ni 'khor lo myur bar 'khor //
T02D1854:20a-22: khro bo'i tshogs de rnams ni mi 'gul lta //
T02D1854:20a-23: rtsibs rnon po yis yongs bcad dum bu yi //
T02D1854:20a-24: nyon mongs sa phyogs bdud rnams slar mi skye //
T02D1854:20a-25: dkon mchog gsum la 'di ru sun 'byin 'gyur //
T02D1854:20a-26: de la gtso bo gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyis //
T02D1854:20a-27: da ni rnam par bzlog nas phyir phyogs su //
T02D1854:20a-28: khro bo'i tshogs de rnams ni bskyod par byas //
T02D1854:20a-29: aom a'a: aushn'i sha badzra tsa kra brti sarba lo ka ki lo kotta ra yantra /
T02D1854:20a-30: mantra m'u la pra yo g'a d'i n'i ma ma
T02D1854:20a-31: kri te ye na ke na tsi ta kri tt'anta
T02D1854:20a-39: kam pa ya kam pa ya /
T02D1854:20a-42: bi ts'u rn'a ya bi ts'u rn'a ya /
T02D1854:20a-43: aushn'i sha bi dza ya tsakra brti /
T02D1854:20a-45: de nas ji skad bshad pa'i bsgom pa yis //
T02D1854:20a-46: dgongs ka lan gsum sngags 'di bzlas par bya //
T02D1854:20a-47: sdang bar sems par byed pa de yi ni //
T02D1854:20a-48: de nyid kyis grub 'gyur te the tshom med //
T02D1854:20b-0: gshin rje mthar byed la sogs @20b rang sprul pa //
T02D1854:20b-1: phyogs bcur gnas pa'i drag po spro bar bya //
T02D1854:20b-2: de rnams kyis kyang sna tshogs yongs khyab pas //
T02D1854:20b-3: bgegs dbang rnams kyi mgul nas thag pas bcings //
T02D1854:20b-4: aom sum bha'i sngags ni zhal bzhi pas //
T02D1854:20b-5: phyogs bzhi dag tu brjod nas bsrung bar bya //
T02D1854:20b-6: yongs su bsrungs nas khro bo'i tshogs sprul pas //
T02D1854:20b-7: shin tu khro dang bcas pa'i sdang mig gis //
T02D1854:20b-8: gtso bo'i rdo rje thob ba dbyug sogs kyis //
T02D1854:20b-9: rang gi lus kun rab tu brdung bar gyur //
T02D1854:20b-10: mdun du zhags pas drangs shing bsdams nas ni //
T02D1854:20b-11: sna tshogs la gdong yang sbyar bar byas //
T02D1854:20b-12: de nas 'od 'bar rdo rje phur bu yis //
T02D1854:20b-13: de steng rang gzugs ji lta bzhin du sprul //
T02D1854:20b-14: bsdus nas 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i bka' thob nas //
T02D1854:20b-15: khro dang bcas pa'i gnod mdzes lus kyis ni //
T02D1854:20b-16: lag pa g-yon pa kun du 'od ldan pas //
T02D1854:20b-17: snying rje med par khu tshur gyis bsdams te //
T02D1854:20b-18: bgegs tshogs de rnams mgon pos bsdus nas ni //
T02D1854:20b-20: aom gha gha gha ta ke na dang /
T02D1854:20b-21: aom badzra la sogs bzlas pa'i tho ba yi //
T02D1854:20b-22: nam mkha' bsdams shing khro drag lta stangs kyis //
T02D1854:20b-23: lag pa g-yas pas shin tu brdung bar bya //
T02D1854:20b-24: yongs su bsrung ba'i cho ga rdzogs so /
T02D1854:20b-26: // / de nyid gsum gyi sa bon dkar dmar gnag
T02D1854:20b-27: / mgo dang zhabs su ho ser gnyis dkyil bcug
T02D1854:20b-28: / nam mkha'i phyogs nas nor bu bzhin lhung ste
T02D1854:20b-29: // kha yi nang nas nang du rab tu zhugs //
T02D1854:20b-30: de nas snying rje ldan pas gzugs brtag pa //
T02D1854:20b-31: dngos po smig rgyu dbang po'i gzhu rang bzhin //
T02D1854:20b-32: bsgoms nas bdag med rang bzhin bsams nas ni //
T02D1854:20b-33: sh'u n+ya la sogs sngags rnams brjod par bya //
T02D1854:20b-35: skad cig de la kha yi nang du zhugs //
T02D1854:20b-36: 'khor lo 'byung bas zla ba'i gzugs su gyur //
T02D1854:20b-37: de dbus h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje dmar //
T02D1854:20b-38: zla h'um rdo rje las byung kun du bzang //
T02D1854:20b-39: zhal gsum de rnams kyi ni nyis 'gyur phyag / zhal ni gangs ri'i mdog 'dra gnag dang dmar //
T02D1854:20b-40: rdo rje ral g-yas nor bu padma g-yon //
T02D1854:20b-41: phyag gnyis kyis ni rang gi rig ma 'khyud //
T02D1854:20b-42: g-yas pas g-yas min brla yi rgyab mnan cing //
T02D1854:20b-43: g-yon pas g-yas pa yongs su mnan pa yis //
T02D1854:20b-44: sna tshogs padma la ni skyil krung bcings //
T02D1854:21a-2: kun du bzang las byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings //
T02D1854:21a-3: rdo rje gsum stong dkar po'i gru gsum ste //
T02D1854:21a-4: h'um ser gyis sbrul zab mo dbus su ni //
T02D1854:21a-5: pam ser de las byung ba'i sna tshogs pad //
T02D1854:21a-6: pad steng kham ljang de las byung ba yi //
T02D1854:21a-7: sna tshogs rdo rje phyogs bcur rigs 'od 'gyed //
T02D1854:21a-8: rdo rje'i steng byung zla ba la gnas pa'i //
T02D1854:21a-9: bhr'um byung 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs bcu gnyis //
T02D1854:21a-10: rten 'brel las ni kun du byung ba yi //
T02D1854:21a-11: phyag g-yas 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad kyis mtshan pa'i //
T02D1854:21a-12: rigs bcas rnam par snang mdzad blta bar bya //
T02D1854:21a-13: kun du bzang po'i rang gzugs ji lta bzhin //
T02D1854:21a-14: 'di yi 'od zer mkha' dbyings rnam spros pas //
T02D1854:21a-15: mnar med me chen la sogs rnam par zhi //
T02D1854:21a-16: sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa phun tshogs grub //
T02D1854:21a-17: de bsdus bdag nyid zla ba sa bon la //
T02D1854:21a-18: spro bsdu yang phyas las byung sangs rgyas sku //
T02D1854:21a-19: sna tshogs rigs kyi bye brag tha dad pa'i //
T02D1854:21a-20: rgyal ba'i sku las byung ba'i sna tshogs 'od //
T02D1854:21a-21: mthu yis de la dkyil 'khor dag tu gyur //
T02D1854:21a-22: zur bzhi pa la shin tu mdzes par byas //
T02D1854:21a-23: de la sgo rnams de bzhin rta babs khyams //
T02D1854:21a-24: zla ba dra phyed rin chen mdzes rnams dang //
T02D1854:21a-25: rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan dril bu dang //
T02D1854:21a-26: ye shes dam pa bsod nams tshogs gnyis kyi //
T02D1854:21a-27: btso ma'i gser gyi rang bzhin bum pa bzang //
T02D1854:21a-28: mdzes pa rnams kyis nang dang phyi rol bzhag / rdo rje rdo rje phyed pa rtse lngas brgyan //
T02D1854:21a-29: sna tshogs g-yer ka dril bu'i sgra rnams dang //
T02D1854:21a-30: me long dang bcas rnga yab rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D1854:21a-31: 'khor lo rin chen chu skyes ral gris mtshan //
T02D1854:21a-32: ka ba brgyad can de ni rnam dgu ldan //
T02D1854:21a-33: sgo yi phyogs gnyis kyi ni ka ba ni //
T02D1854:21a-34: ri dags gnyis dbus chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1854:21a-35: rdo rje 'dzin pas 'khor lo byas shing zlum //
T02D1854:21a-36: de yi phyi rol kun du 'od tshogs 'khyil //
T02D1854:21a-38: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1854:21a-39: nyi shur gcig gis mtshang de rnams kyi ;
T02D1854:21a-40: / pi las byung ba'i sna tshogs padma'i gdan //
T02D1854:21a-41: 'gro ba ma lus nye bar 'khrul pas na //
T02D1854:21a-42: rnam par dag pa'i padma'i gdan rnams yin //
T02D1854:21a-43: ram las byung ba'i nyi ma bdun du gyur //
T02D1854:21a-44: aom las byung ba'i rgyas pa'i zla bcu gnyis //
T02D1854:21a-45: nyon mongs thams cad nges bar bsreg pa'i phyir //
T02D1854:21b-0: rnam par dag pa'i @21b nyi ma bdun du gyur //
T02D1854:21b-1: bsod nams kun gyi myu gu bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02D1854:21b-2: zla ba'i gdan rnams dag ni byung ba yin //
T02D1854:21b-3: dbus su zla ba dbang po'i phyogs su'ang zla //
T02D1854:21b-4: yongs su lhag pa'i phyogs su'ang nyi ma gsum //
T02D1854:21b-5: zur bzhi mtshams rnams su yang zla ba'o //
T02D1854:21b-6: rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba nye bar mdzes //
T02D1854:21b-7: phyi rol zur bzhi dang ni mtshams rnams dang //
T02D1854:21b-8: shar gyi sgo yi g-yon dang g-yas gnyis su //
T02D1854:21b-9: so so so so yi ni zla ba'i gzugs //
T02D1854:21b-10: sgo rnams de nyid du ni nyi ma bzhi //
T02D1854:21b-11: de bzhin dbus su zla ba'i steng du ni //
T02D1854:21b-12: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis ni rnam par bsgom //
T02D1854:21b-13: g-yon pa zla 'dir yi ge bcu drug sogs //
T02D1854:21b-14: g-yas pa'i zla gyur ka sogs ha mthar thug / zla bcas de la wa ya la gsum dang //
T02D1854:21b-15: aa ka pa ao de la rab tu sbyar //
T02D1854:21b-16: de dag rnams ni nyis 'gyur rnams su bya //
T02D1854:21b-17: gang 'gyur de gnyis a'a li k'a li zla //
T02D1854:21b-18: lugs su byung dang lugs las bzlog par bshad //
T02D1854:21b-19: dbyangs yig rnam dkar phreng ni gnyis su gyur //
T02D1854:21b-20: pha rol gsal byed rnams ni 'di ru dmar //
T02D1854:21b-21: de gnyis dbus su ram ni rnam par bsam //
T02D1854:21b-22: zhu bas gnyig gcig gyur 'od kyi tshogs //
T02D1854:21b-23: 'od tshogs h'um byung h'um las rdo rje dmar //
T02D1854:21b-24: de yi dbus su zla gyur sa bon steng //
T02D1854:21b-25: zla h'um rdo rje las byung zla dbus su //
T02D1854:21b-26: ye shes rang bzhin las byung rdzogs par gyur //
T02D1854:21b-27: sku la sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang zhing //
T02D1854:21b-28: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yang dag spras //
T02D1854:21b-29: me long ye shes la sogs nang du ni //
T02D1854:21b-30: sngags rnams lnga po 'di dag legs par sbyar //
T02D1854:21b-31: aom sogs tsi ta pra ti bya dham ka / de srid mtha' mar de bzhin legs par brjod //
T02D1854:21b-32: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gzhan gyur pa //
T02D1854:21b-33: zla gnyis 'dus gyur pa yi rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1854:21b-34: me long ye shes rang bzhin de gcig go //
T02D1854:21b-35: nyon mongs yid kyi rnam shes gzhan gyur pa //
T02D1854:21b-36: 'od tshogs gang yin de yang rin chen 'byung //
T02D1854:21b-37: de ni ye shes gnyis pa mnyam nyid gyur //
T02D1854:21b-38: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gzhan gyur pa //
T02D1854:21b-39: h'um byung rdo rje 'dzin pa 'od dpag med //
T02D1854:21b-40: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes 'di gsum pa //
T02D1854:21b-41: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa gzhan gyur pa //
T02D1854:21b-42: rdo rje'i dbus kyi sa bon don yod grub //
T02D1854:21b-43: bya ba nan tan grub 'di bzhi pa yin //
T02D1854:21b-44: rang gi rnam par shes pa gzhan gyur pa //
T02D1854:22a-1: rnam bzhi rang bzhin gang yin gcig / de ni ye shes lnga par 'di ru bshad //
T02D1854:22a-2: spro dang bsdu ba thams cad las byung ba'i //
T02D1854:22a-3: rnam dag gnyis med chos dbyings rdo rje sems //
T02D1854:22a-4: zhal gsum dbus dang yan lag thams cad dkar //
T02D1854:22a-5: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis sngo dang dmar //
T02D1854:22a-6: rdor la g-yas na rin chen padma g-yon //
T02D1854:22a-7: phyag gnyis kyis ni rig ma 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1854:22a-8: nyes pa thams cad 'bigs pas rdo rje ste //
T02D1854:22a-9: las dang ma rig kun gcod phyir ral gri //
T02D1854:22a-10: 'gro ba thams cad kyi ni bsam pa rnams //
T02D1854:22a-11: yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ni rin chen no //
T02D1854:22a-12: 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang 'dam kun gyis //
T02D1854:22a-13: ma gos par gyur phyir ni padma'o //
T02D1854:22a-14: 'di ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1854:22a-15: srid gsum 'jig rten de ni nang gnas shing //
T02D1854:22a-16: dngos po thams cad ro gcig chos kyi dbyings //
T02D1854:22a-17: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yum //
T02D1854:22a-18: mtshan ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
T02D1854:22a-19: 'dod chags la sogs kyis gdungs chus khengs pa'i //
T02D1854:22a-20: 'gro ba chu bo bzhi yis kun du bdas //
T02D1854:22a-21: nga rgyal la sogs dba' rlabs pha rol dogs //
T02D1854:22a-22: thag ring klong du las kyi rlung gis shin tu bdas //
T02D1854:22a-23: byams pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1854:22a-24: sems can 'khor bas gdungs pa mthong nas ni //
T02D1854:22a-25: snying rje'i ting 'dzin rgya chen bskyed par bya //
T02D1854:22a-26: thabs dang rig pa dgyes pa'i sgra rnams kyis //
T02D1854:22a-27: mkha' la sangs rgyas sems can dgyes pa bskyed //
T02D1854:22a-28: 'od zer dra spros drangs pa'i mgon po rnams //
T02D1854:22a-29: kha yi dra bas nang du gzhug par bya //
T02D1854:22a-30: zhu gyur rdo rje lam byung gsang byung 'gyur //
T02D1854:22a-31: phyin gnas pa'i lha mo rnam pa dgu //
T02D1854:22a-32: rim bzhin spos dang bdug pa mar me dang //
T02D1854:22a-33: dri dang de bzhin me long la sogs lnga //
T02D1854:22a-34: mchod pa bya phyir lag na thogs par blta //
T02D1854:22a-35: lha mo rnams dang rang nyid rdo rje sems //
T02D1854:22a-36: dang po spyan la sogs pa spro bar bya //
T02D1854:22a-37: gzugs la sogs pa lha mo kun kyang 'byung //
T02D1854:22a-38: slar bcug thams cad rdo rje lam phyung nas //
T02D1854:22a-39: padma'i sgo ru nges par 'bab 'gyur te //
T02D1854:22a-40: gsang ba'i lte ba'i zla dbus gzhug par bya //
T02D1854:22a-41: 'od zer de byung bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
T02D1854:22a-42: bskyed nas srid pa gsum na gnas pa yi //
T02D1854:22a-43: sems can gang yin thams cad gzhug par bya //
T02D1854:22a-44: snying rje phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1854:22a-45: rdo rje bcom nas padma legs phye ba'i //
T02D1854:22b-0: @22b de yi 'od kyis sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas //
T02D1854:22b-1: khar gzhug rdo rje lam ni byung gyur pa //
T02D1854:22b-2: rgyal ba la sogs zla ba zhus dbang bskur //
T02D1854:22b-3: mig la sogs pa drug dang gzugs rdo rje //
T02D1854:22b-4: spyan la sogs dang bde bar gshegs pa lnga //
T02D1854:22b-5: de bzhin gzhan yang khro bo bzhi rnams dang //
T02D1854:22b-6: de dag rnams ni rang gi gzugs su gyur //
T02D1854:22b-7: dga' ba phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1854:22b-8: stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams gnas gyur //
T02D1854:22b-9: phyi rol sems can gzhan dag dga' med pa //
T02D1854:22b-10: kshim la sogs pa'i sa bon gyis spro ste //
T02D1854:22b-11: de rnams thams cad byang chub la gzhol byas //
T02D1854:22b-12: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1854:22b-13: sems can don du smon lam byas gyur pa //
T02D1854:22b-14: gang yin de ni bdag gis yongs su bskyang //
T02D1854:22b-15: 'gro ba mya ngan 'das par 'dul don phyir //
T02D1854:22b-16: stong pa nyid du rab bzhugs bzhed par gyur //
T02D1854:22b-18: btang snyoms yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1854:22b-19: aom dang a'a: h'um dkar zhing dmar dang gnag /'od ser ho gnyis kyi ni dbus gnas pa //
T02D1854:22b-20: kha yi nang bzhugs padma'i dbus gnas te //
T02D1854:22b-21: mgon po rig ma gnyi ga zhu bar byas //
T02D1854:22b-22: 'das dang ma byon pa dang da ltar gyi //
T02D1854:22b-23: sems can dag tu gyur pa gang cung zad //
T02D1854:22b-24: de rnams rgyu gang gis ni yongs grol ba //
T02D1854:22b-25: mgon po bzhugs pa stong nyid rab zhugs gyur //
T02D1854:22b-26: gang rnams thog ma med pa'i dus dbus bsgom //
T02D1854:22b-27: thog med dus mtha' nas ni mi g-yo ba'i //
T02D1854:22b-28: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi gzugs kyi lha mo rnams //
T02D1854:22b-29: rdo rje thugs khyod la sogs pa bzhi yis //
T02D1854:22b-30: rang gi glu rnams kyis ni yang dag bskul //
T02D1854:22b-31: rdo rje rje gsal stong nyid yang dag spangs //
T02D1854:22b-32: mam bsam snga ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gyur //
T02D1854:22b-33: sna tshogs padma'i 'dab ma'i gdan dbus su //
T02D1854:22b-34: zla ba bcu gnyis dang ni nyi ma bdun //
T02D1854:22b-35: de dbus padma zla ba'i gdan dbus su //
T02D1854:22b-36: mam las byung ba'i ral gri rnam pa bsam / ral gri'i steng du yang ni zla mam ste //
T02D1854:22b-37: ral gri zla mam las byung 'jam rdo rje //
T02D1854:22b-39: ral gri zhal dang rang sku gur kum mdog //
T02D1854:22b-40: g-yas ba sngo zhing g-yas pa min pa'ang dkar //
T02D1854:22b-41: ral gri mda' dang autpala gzhu bsnams shing //
T02D1854:22b-42: de yi phyag gnyis shes rab kun du 'khyud //
T02D1854:22b-43: shes rab rnam dag ngo bo ral gri ste //
T02D1854:22b-44: chos rnams 'bigs par byed pa nyid kyis ni //
T02D1854:23a-0: rnam par dag pa'i thabs kyi ngo bo @23a * //
T02D1854:23a-2: sems can thams cad tshim par byed pas na //
T02D1854:23a-3: autpala sngon po nyes kun gnyen po dang //
T02D1854:23a-4: yon tan thams cad 'dzin par byed pa'i gzhu //
T02D1854:23a-5: rnam pa sna tshogs mchog rnams kyis brgyan cing //
T02D1854:23a-6: yid du 'ong ba'i rin chen mchog gis brgyan //
T02D1854:23a-7: sangs rgyas lngar byas bdag nyid lus las spro //
T02D1854:23a-8: ri rab bzhin du mi g-yo dpal gyis mdzes //
T02D1854:23a-9: rang gri sa bon dkyil 'khor dbus su mam //
T02D1854:23a-10: yang na gzhan ci 'dod pa'i cho gas mgon //
T02D1854:23a-11: de nyid kyi ni gnas su gyur pa ste //
T02D1854:23a-12: dkyil 'khor dbang po de yi gzugs 'dzin 'gyur //
T02D1854:23a-13: gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa'i sems nyid med //
T02D1854:23a-14: aom dharma dh'a tu la sogs sngags brjod cing //
T02D1854:23a-15: brjod pa tsam gyis rdzogs par gyur pa ni //
T02D1854:23a-16: de 'dir bsnyen pa'i yan lag rdzogs byas pa'i //
T02D1854:23a-17: mig gnyis nang dang rna ba sna dang lce //
T02D1854:23a-18: yan lag dam pa brang dang zla gnas drug / kshim dzr'i de bzhin kham gam de nas yang //
T02D1854:23a-19: shkam sam yi ge drug nyid rnam par bsgom //
T02D1854:23a-20: 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen padma dang //
T02D1854:23a-21: ral gri dang ni rdo rje rim bzhin du //
T02D1854:23a-22: phyag mtshan de rnams yang dag byung ba dang //
T02D1854:23a-23: mtshan ma de rnams dbus su zla sa bon //
T02D1854:23a-24: phyag mtshan zla ba sa bon bcas byung ba'i //
T02D1854:23a-25: yan lag sa bon dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan rigs //
T02D1854:23a-26: drug po brla gnyis rdo rje skyil krung gis //
T02D1854:23a-27: zla bcas sna tshogs padma kun du gnas //
T02D1854:23a-28: sa dbang rdo rje'i dbang po lag na rin //
T02D1854:23a-29: 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrib sel kun du bzang //
T02D1854:23a-30: dkar dang sngo dang de bzhin ser dang dmar //
T02D1854:23a-31: ljang dang skya dang gzhan yang de la sogs //
T02D1854:23a-32: sa yi dbang phyug gzugs kyi rdo rjes 'khyud //
T02D1854:23a-33: rdo rje dbang po yang ni sgra rdo rjes //
T02D1854:23a-34: nam mkha'i snying po dri yi rdo rjes 'khyud //
T02D1854:23a-35: 'jig rten dbang phyug kyang ni ro yis te //
T02D1854:23a-36: sgrib pa rnam par sel ba reg pas 'khyud //
T02D1854:23a-37: chos kyis 'khyud pa yang ni kun du bzang //
T02D1854:23a-38: de rnams bcu gnyis phyi nang dbye ba las //
T02D1854:23a-39: skye mched de rnams rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1854:23a-40: gzugs rdor la sogs lha mo de dag rnams //
T02D1854:23a-41: gang yin phun tshogs skye mched dkyil 'khor gnas //
T02D1854:23a-42: de dag rnams la 'khyud gyur de bzhin du //
T02D1854:23a-43: bzlog pas gnas tshe thams cad de bzhin gyur //
T02D1854:23a-44: de bzhin rtag tu bsgom pa bsgom bdag nyid //
T02D1854:23a-45: skad cig la ni mngon shes drug thob 'gyur //
T02D1854:23b-0: pha rol phyin @23b drug rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor phar //
T02D1854:23b-1: gyur te nye ba yi ni sgrub pa rdzogs //
T02D1854:23b-3: rdo rje gsum rdzogs nges par gnas don du //
T02D1854:23b-4: zla gsum snying ga lkog ma mgo bor yang //
T02D1854:23b-5: brang dang lkog ma'i bar du bzhi pa dgod //
T02D1854:23b-6: sna tshogs padma rgyas pa'i dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D1854:23b-7: h'um gi rdo rje las byung thugs rdo rje //
T02D1854:23b-8: aa ni padma las byung khyad 'phags ngag / aom gyi 'khor lo yis ni sku rdo rje //
T02D1854:23b-9: mam gyi ral gri las byung 'jam rdo rje //
T02D1854:23b-10: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa sbrul pa yi //
T02D1854:23b-11: sku gsum rnam par grol ba'i bdag nyid de //
T02D1854:23b-12: des dbyings ye shes rang bzhin bzhi pa'o //
T02D1854:23b-13: sngon po dmar po dang ni dkar dang ser //
T02D1854:23b-14: dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya che //
T02D1854:23b-15: ngag gi rdo rje'i sku 'khyud chos phyag rgya //
T02D1854:23b-16: dam pa'i sku yi rdo rje las phyag rgya //
T02D1854:23b-17: 'jam dbyangs nyid 'khyud dam tshig phyag rgya'o //
T02D1854:23b-18: de rnams bzhi po zla ba'i 'od kyis brgyan //
T02D1854:23b-19: rdo rje'i skyil krung gis kyang shin tu gnas //
T02D1854:23b-20: phyag rgya rnams kyi so so'i dbus su ni //
T02D1854:23b-21: 'di ltar bsgom par bya zhes la la 'chang //
T02D1854:23b-22: de rnams kyi ni dbus su 'di lta yang //
T02D1854:23b-23: ram bam yam lam la sogs yi ge dgod par bya //
T02D1854:23b-24: 'di rnams bzhi po rdzogs par gyur pa dang //
T02D1854:23b-25: me chu rlung dang dbang gi dkyil 'khor rnams //
T02D1854:23b-26: dmar po gru gsum dkar zhing zlum pa dang //
T02D1854:23b-27: gzhu 'od sngon po ser po gru bzhi pa'o //
T02D1854:23b-28: mdung dang bum pa ba dan rdo rje yis //
T02D1854:23b-29: go rims ji bzhin de rnams mchan par 'dod //
T02D1854:23b-30: dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su rang sa bon //
T02D1854:23b-31: dmar ba phyag mtshan zla gnas nyis 'gyur bya //
T02D1854:23b-32: mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams dang gdan la sogs //
T02D1854:23b-33: thugs rdo rje dang 'dra ba de rdzogs bya //
T02D1854:23b-34: rig ma sbangs shing phyag gnyis zhal gcig ste //
T02D1854:23b-35: cod pan mtshon cha rgyan med de rnams ni //
T02D1854:23b-36: sngar gsungs dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ni //
T02D1854:23b-37: rnam par bsgom par bya zhes gzhan rnams 'chad //
T02D1854:23b-38: sems kyi 'od zer tshogs las rang byung ba'i //
T02D1854:23b-39: shes rab yan lag gis 'khyud gsal ba'i thugs //
T02D1854:23b-40: rgyal ba'i dbang po'i zhing rnams yang dag mchod //
T02D1854:23b-41: rang gi lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab //
T02D1854:23b-42: dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang zhes thugs brjod de //
T02D1854:23b-43: chos kyi gsung lam zhes bshad gsung brjod de //
T02D1854:23b-44: de bzhin dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang sku ste //
T02D1854:24a-1: sgrub yan lag / sngags spangs brjod de sems kyis dbang bskur te //
T02D1854:24a-2: dpal ldan ye shes sems dpa' rtag tu bskul //
T02D1854:24a-3: gang phyir 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyud gsungs //
T02D1854:24a-4: shes rab rno can de rnams kyis rab sgrub //
T02D1854:24a-6: bdag gis bdag snying ye shes 'od tshogs kyis ;
T02D1854:24a-7: / mkha' bzhugs rgyal ba ma lus yang dag bskul //
T02D1854:24a-8: de yi lus nang byung ba'i 'od zer las //
T02D1854:24a-9: gzugs sogs rdo rje rang byung gzhan yang ni //
T02D1854:24a-10: dpal ldan m'a ma k'i dang gos dkar can //
T02D1854:24a-11: sgrol ma zhes bya lha mo de rnams ni //
T02D1854:24a-12: rnga yi sgra ldan rnams kyi sgra sgrogs shing //
T02D1854:24a-13: byug pa la sogs me tog phreng thogs shing //
T02D1854:24a-14: gser gyi bum pa ye shes chus gang ba //
T02D1854:24a-15: bkra shis bum pa lag thogs klu rnams kyis //
T02D1854:24a-16: rang gtso cod pan thogs shing mkha' dkyil gnas //
T02D1854:24a-17: mchog tu dbang bskur bar ni dbab par bya //
T02D1854:24a-18: bab 'gyur de nyid las ni byung ba yi //
T02D1854:24a-19: mi bskyod rdo rje cod pan dag tu gnas //
T02D1854:24a-20: mthong na shin tu sems ni rnam dag par //
T02D1854:24a-21: gyur pa de nyid sgrub pa chen po'o //
T02D1854:24a-23: rig ma mtshan mchog yon tan kun ldan pa //
T02D1854:24a-24: rang gis bon las byung kun du rtog / dkyil
T02D1854:24a-25: 'khor mngon sum du ni rab tu gzhag / de
T02D1854:24a-26: la bsnyen pa la sogs des byas bdag / sa
T02D1854:24a-27: snying la sogs rnams kyis gang bar blta //
T02D1854:24a-28: sku la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum gyi lus //
T02D1854:24a-29: de 'dir chos la sbyar bar gyur pa yis //
T02D1854:24a-30: glo bur las byung lus ni kun du dgang //
T02D1854:24a-31: mgo snying lte ba rked pa brla gnyis su //
T02D1854:24a-32: aom h'um sv'a a'a: h'a zhes go rims bzhin //
T02D1854:24a-33: de rnams mdog ni bye brag shes nas ni //
T02D1854:24a-34: rnam dgod rigs lnga ru ni rab tu bya //
T02D1854:24a-35: aa las byung ba'i gsang ba'i lte bar ni //
T02D1854:24a-36: h'um las sna tshogs padma 'dab brgyad kyi //
T02D1854:24a-37: nor bu aom dang rang gi rdo rje h'um //
T02D1854:24a-38: sbubs gnyis su ni yi ge phat bsgom bya //
T02D1854:24a-39: de 'og aom sarba ta th'a ga ta zhes //
T02D1854:24a-40: aa nu r'a ga na 'khyud gnyis su bya //
T02D1854:24a-42: de nas sngar bshad dbang bskur shes byas nas //
T02D1854:24a-43: rig dang lhan cig 'di ru dga' bar bya //
T02D1854:24a-45: dang por bsnyen pa'i yan lag de nas nyer sgrub pa //
T02D1854:24a-46: bsgub pa'i yan lag chen po la sogs kyang //
T02D1854:24a-47: rtul po la sogs sbyor byas so sor ni //
T02D1854:24a-48: 'gyur te bzhi ru yang ni bshad par grags //
T02D1854:24b-0: rtul sogs rgyu @24b mthun rnam smin skyes bu byed //
T02D1854:24b-1: dbang gi 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi ru bzhag / bsnyen pa'i yan lag nas brtsams bya ba nas //
T02D1854:24b-2: thabs las byung ba'i bya ba rnam pa bzhi //
T02D1854:24b-3: shes rab kyis 'gyur de bzhin cho ga rnams //
T02D1854:24b-4: bsnyen pa'i yan lag la sogs dbang bskur mtha' //
T02D1854:24b-5: rgyu mthun la sogs bcas pa dbus kyi ming //
T02D1854:24b-6: yan lag bzhir 'gyur dang po'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1854:24b-7: snying ga'i zla dbus gnas pa'i sngags 'od kyi //
T02D1854:24b-8: rgyal ba'i dbang po'i sku la ma lus gzhug / bde ba chen po las byung byang chub sems //
T02D1854:24b-9: h'um rdor las byung dkyil 'khor dkyil dbang dgod //
T02D1854:24b-11: dve sha ra t'i ra bcas pa'i thugs rdo rje //
T02D1854:24b-12: aindra n'i la bcas byas lus 'chang zhing //
T02D1854:24b-13: zhe sdang ngo bo sna tshogs padma la //
T02D1854:24b-14: bzhugs pa'i badzra dhrik ni zla dbus su //
T02D1854:24b-16: bhr'um 'khor las ni dzi na dzi ka gtso bo //
T02D1854:24b-17: rnam par snang mdzad gti mug 'dra rang bzhin //
T02D1854:24b-18: zla ba bye ba yi ni 'od gsal ba //
T02D1854:24b-19: shar phyogs zla dbus mo ha ra t'ir bcas //
T02D1854:24b-20: a'am gi rin chen las byung gser btso'i 'od //
T02D1854:24b-21: rin dbang mgon po badzra ra t'ir bcas //
T02D1854:24b-22: nga rgyal gtso bo ratna dhrik ces pa //
T02D1854:24b-23: 'di gdan nyi ma'i steng bzhugs lho phyogs su //
T02D1854:24b-24: dzr'im gi padma las byung mtshal mdog 'od //
T02D1854:24b-25: 'dod chags la bzhugs mgon po 'od dpag med //
T02D1854:24b-26: r'a ga ra t'i sa dam 'khyud a'a ro lik
T02D1854:24b-27: / nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs 'gyur nub phyogs su
T02D1854:24b-28: // kham gi ral gri las byung mdog mchog ljang //
T02D1854:24b-29: phrag dog rang bzhin de yang don yod grub //
T02D1854:24b-30: nu ma gnyis bsten badzra ra t'ir bcas //
T02D1854:24b-31: pradzny'a dhri ka ces byang phyogs nyid bus su //
T02D1854:24b-32: ye shes lnga phung rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1854:24b-33: lam gyi 'khor lo las byung mtshams su ni //
T02D1854:24b-34: rnam par snang mdzad mdog 'dra zla dkyil nas //
T02D1854:24b-35: sgeg pa'i cha byad rgyal la rab tu chags //
T02D1854:24b-36: mo ha ra ti gang yin de nyid spyan //
T02D1854:24b-37: mam gyi autpala dmar mo'i phyag mtshan byung //
T02D1854:24b-38: mi bskyod pa 'dra gshin rje'i phyogs zla dbus //
T02D1854:24b-39: rtag tu dang po'i sangs rgyas thabs cig sbyor //
T02D1854:24b-40: dve sha ra ti m'a ma k'i gzhan min //
T02D1854:24b-41: pam gyi padma las byung zla dbus su //
T02D1854:24b-42: snang ba mtha' yas mdog 'dra rlung gi phyogs //
T02D1854:24b-43: padma'i mgon po yis ni kun du 'khyud //
T02D1854:24b-44: gos dkar gang yin r'a ga ra t'i'ang de //
T02D1854:24b-45: t'am gi autpala gser las byung gyur pa //
T02D1854:24b-46: rin dbang 'od 'dra badzra ra t'i sgrol //
T02D1854:25a-1: phyogs su zla ba la gnas shing //
T02D1854:25a-2: don yod rdo rje'i yan lag gis 'khyud byas //
T02D1854:25a-3: 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1854:25a-4: phyi rol byung nas me yi phyogs su ni //
T02D1854:25a-5: skor phyogs de nyid kyi ni nang du'ang //
T02D1854:25a-6: zla ba drug dbus rang gi phyag mtshan rgyu //
T02D1854:25a-7: 'od ldan yi ge drug pa mthong nas ni ;
T02D1854:25a-8: / mtshams de rnams su dza: h'um bam ho: dang //
T02D1854:25a-9: kham ram shar gyi sgo gyur phyogs gnyis su //
T02D1854:25a-10: me long pi wang dkar po dri dung chos //
T02D1854:25a-11: ro yi snod dang sna tshogs gos mkha' dbyings //
T02D1854:25a-12: sa bon bsam pa'i mtshan ma de mthong nas //
T02D1854:25a-13: gzugs rdo rje sogs lha mo de rnams drug / de rnams sa bon la sogs mdog 'dra zhing //
T02D1854:25a-14: lus la rtag tu de nyid gsum bsam bya //
T02D1854:25a-15: pha rol phyin drug rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1854:25a-16: ram h'um nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
T02D1854:25a-17: h'um gi sa bon mtshan byung khro bo'i gzugs //
T02D1854:25a-18: ji skad bshad pa'i khro bo'i tshogs nang gnas //
T02D1854:25a-19: bsgom bya de rnams rtag tu g-yas brkyang bzlog / mya ngan 'das srid rnam dag g-yas brkyang ba'o //
T02D1854:25a-20: gshin rje mthar byed dbang po zhes bya'i sgor //
T02D1854:25a-21: shes rab mthar byed nyi ma la skyes phyogs //
T02D1854:25a-22: padma mthar byed klu yi gtso bo'i phyogs //
T02D1854:25a-23: bgegs mthar byed pa rnam thos phyogs na gnas //
T02D1854:25a-24: dad pa la sogs pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1854:25a-25: gshin rje mthar byed de yi be t'a l'i //
T02D1854:25a-26: shes rab mthar byed gzhan gyis mi thub ma //
T02D1854:25a-27: padma mthar byed lhan cig khro gnyer can //
T02D1854:25a-28: bgegs mthar byed pa ral pa gcig mar dmigs //
T02D1854:25a-29: ma lus 'khor lo sna tshogs padma la //
T02D1854:25a-30: nyi zla'i dbus su ni lta ba bzhin bzhugs //
T02D1854:25a-31: zhi ba'i gzugs can gang yin 'dir lha rnams //
T02D1854:25a-32: de rnams thams cad rdo rje'i skyil krung gyur //
T02D1854:25a-33: ting 'dzin chen po thob pas shin tu zhi //
T02D1854:25a-34: bdud rnams bzhi las mchog tu rgyal gyur pas //
T02D1854:25a-35: rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje skyil krung ngo //
T02D1854:25a-36: sangs rgyas sogs gzhan lha mo rnams bcas pa //
T02D1854:25a-37: dgyes pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnam par sbyar //
T02D1854:25a-38: dbus na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gtso bo yi //
T02D1854:25a-39: zhal 'di rnams kyi zhal ni nges par lta //
T02D1854:25a-40: rigs rnams dang po'i rigs ni rdo rje'i rigs //
T02D1854:25a-41: de bzhin gshegs dang rin chen rigs gsum pa //
T02D1854:25a-42: de nas padma'i rigs ni bzhi pa ste //
T02D1854:25a-43: sna tshogs rigs ni la lar las kyi rigs //
T02D1854:25a-44: sngon po la sogs gang yin mdog lnga yang //
T02D1854:25b-0: de @25b mdog tha dad pas ni rigs rnams lnga //
T02D1854:25b-1: sems can bsam pa tha dad mdog tha dad //
T02D1854:25b-2: rigs las rang byung sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku //
T02D1854:25b-3: de rnams yan lag mchog rnams gsum gyis brgyan //
T02D1854:25b-4: sku gsung thugs ni rnam dag zhal gsum pa'o //
T02D1854:25b-5: sngon po dkar po gnyis kyi g-yon pa dmar //
T02D1854:25b-6: g-yas pa gnyis mdog rnam par zlog pa'o //
T02D1854:25b-7: ser po dang ni dmar po ljang gu'i sku //
T02D1854:25b-8: g-yas min dang ni g-yas pa dkar dang sngo //
T02D1854:25b-9: rigs kyi lha mo 'di dag rnams kyi ni //
T02D1854:25b-10: zhal gyi mdog rnams kyang ni so sor gyur //
T02D1854:25b-11: de rnams phyag drug dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02D1854:25b-12: gtso bo'i phyag gnyis kyis ni mtshon cha spangs //
T02D1854:25b-13: lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur ni //
T02D1854:25b-14: so so so sor nges bcings de 'og tu //
T02D1854:25b-15: mthe'u chung rtse mo lcags kyu'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02D1854:25b-16: lag pa gnyis kyi mkhrig ma gnyis ni sbyar //
T02D1854:25b-17: gnas ldan gang yin la ni phyi rol gyis //
T02D1854:25b-18: de yi phang dbus 'dug 'gyur des mgul phyogs //
T02D1854:25b-19: g-yon pa'i nang du lag gnyis phyi rol gyur //
T02D1854:25b-20: gcig la gcig 'khyud phyag rgya bcing bar bya //
T02D1854:25b-21: pha rol phyin drug rnam dag phyag drug po //
T02D1854:25b-22: bakte ne pa ktvam ba ri tsumba man //
T02D1854:25b-23: dante shva na tam pa te ne pa ktvam ba ri tsumba man //
T02D1854:25b-24: dante shva na tam pa pr //
T02D1854:25b-25: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rgyal po'i rnam par bsgom //
T02D1854:25b-26: ngo bo nyid kyis rnam dag 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1854:25b-27: gang yang phyag mtshan mchog las byung gang yin //
T02D1854:25b-28: mtshan ma mchog de lag pa g-yas su ste //
T02D1854:25b-29: phyag gsum thams cad la ni ral gri'o //
T02D1854:25b-30: ral gri las byung 'khor lo 'dzin 'gyur te //
T02D1854:25b-31: rin chen rigs kyi g-yon pa padmar gyur //
T02D1854:25b-32: de bzhin padma rigs kyi rin chen te //
T02D1854:25b-33: 'di gnyis kyi ni gsum ngar 'khor lor gyur //
T02D1854:25b-34: gzhan rnams kun gyi lag pa nor bu pad //
T02D1854:25b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa dang //
T02D1854:25b-36: shes rab pha rol rnam dag phyag mtshan no //
T02D1854:25b-37: rgyal ba lnga po rnams kyi ral pa'i tshogs //
T02D1854:25b-38: 'dir ni de rnams bye brag gcig yod 'gyur //
T02D1854:25b-39: zhi ba rnams ni rin 'bar cod pan thogs //
T02D1854:25b-40: khro bo rnams ni sbrul gyis sku brgyan cing //
T02D1854:25b-41: dpung pa lag ngar rked pa rkang pa dag / mgrin pa dang ni rna ba mgor thogs pa //
T02D1854:25b-42: 'od ldan nor bus spras pa gser gyis bcings //
T02D1854:25b-43: ji lta ji ltar yan lag rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D1854:26a-0: thabs kyis gyur pa gang yin @26a * //
T02D1854:26a-2: phyag dang mdog dang mtshon cha gos 'byung ba //
T02D1854:26a-3: gnas dang gnas pa nyid kyis gang dang gang //
T02D1854:26a-4: de rnams kyang ni sar gyur sa yir gyur //
T02D1854:26a-5: dkyil 'khor 'di ni gsang 'gyur rnam par bsam //
T02D1854:26a-6: byung nas de yang go rims ji lta bzhin //
T02D1854:26a-7: yid gsum badzra dhrik sogs sngags rnams kyis //
T02D1854:26a-8: dam tshig la sogs pa dang thabs cig bya //
T02D1854:26a-9: mi bskyod rdo rje snying gar thugs rdo rje //
T02D1854:26a-10: rab zhugs nam mkha' dang mnyam ngo bo nyid //
T02D1854:26a-11: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs gzhan rnams kyang //
T02D1854:26a-12: gsang ba'i nang bshad gang yin phyogs rnams su'o //
T02D1854:26a-13: de dbus sngags kyi 'od zer rnams byung nas //
T02D1854:26a-14: gshin rje mthar byed ltar gyur nam mkhar gnas //
T02D1854:26a-15: rdo rje lcags kyus 'khor lo drangs nas ni //
T02D1854:26a-16: de nas mdun gyi dkyil 'khor dag tu bya //
T02D1854:26a-17: rdzogs nas yon khyab mchog bkang padma'i snod //
T02D1854:26a-18: lag pa gnyis kyis kun du bzung nas kyang //
T02D1854:26a-19: de nas lag pa g-yon pas ba dan gzung //
T02D1854:26a-20: lag pa g-yas pa yi ni tsandan mdzes //
T02D1854:26a-21: me tog chu sogs kyis mdzes bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D1854:26a-22: rang gi snying sogs bzlas pa'i mchod pa 'bul //
T02D1854:26a-23: gshin rje mthar byed la sogs thams cad kyang //
T02D1854:26a-24: dza: zhes lhag par smra zhing srung par byed //
T02D1854:26a-25: de bzhin khro gzhan rang gi las kyi mtha' //
T02D1854:26a-26: dza:h'um bam ho: bcas pa'i sgra sgrogs shing //
T02D1854:26a-27: gzhan gyis mi thub padma bgegs mthar byed //
T02D1854:26a-28: rab bzhugs bcings pa dang ni dgyes par byed //
T02D1854:26a-29: zhes pa'i bar gyur 'di ltar lhag bsnyen pa //
T02D1854:26a-30: lhag pa'i rgyu mthun 'bras bu dang lhan cig / de nas thams cad kun du dgyes pa dang //
T02D1854:26a-31: mig la sogs pa'i yan lag byin gyis brlab //
T02D1854:26a-32: sku sogs tshig gsum gyis ni byin brlabs te //
T02D1854:26a-33: dbang bskur byas pa'i dus kyi tha mar gnas //
T02D1854:26a-34: de rnams rim gyis gnas pa'i bar du ni //
T02D1854:26a-35: lhag pa'i 'bras bu gsum bcas yan lag go //
T02D1854:26a-36: rang gi sems las kun 'byung 'od chen 'phros //
T02D1854:26a-37: nam mkha'i rgyal dang rig ma kun nas drangs //
T02D1854:26a-38: nam mkha' khyab par gdan la bzhugs par gyur //
T02D1854:26a-39: rang gi bdag po bcings nas cod pan bcings //
T02D1854:26a-40: gshin rje mthar byed pad mthar rdo rje gzhan //
T02D1854:26a-41: khro bo bgegs dgra rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas //
T02D1854:26a-42: nga rgyal bzhi po sems bdag 'jam dbyangs bcas //
T02D1854:26b-0: kun @26b du bzang dang phyag na rdo rje dang //
T02D1854:26b-1: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' chos dbyings dang //
T02D1854:26b-2: dpal ldan dve sha rar bcas sgra rdo rje //
T02D1854:26b-3: 'di rnams cod pan rdo rje mi bskyod pa /
T02D1854:26b-4: mi bskyod rdo rje'i steng du rdo rje sems //
T02D1854:26b-5: sa snying sku dbang dang ni gzugs rdo rje //
T02D1854:26b-6: gshin rje mthar byed mo ha ra t'i rnams //
T02D1854:26b-7: 'di rnams kyi ni spyi bor rnam snang bzhugs //
T02D1854:26b-8: mkha' snying dri yi steng du rin chen tog / ngag rdor 'jig rten dbang phyug dri dang ro //
T02D1854:26b-9: pad mthar phyin rnams cod pan 'od dpag med //
T02D1854:26b-10: reg rdor sgrib sel badzra ra t'i rnams //
T02D1854:26b-11: spyi bor yang ni don yod grub pa bzhugs //
T02D1854:26b-12: rang gi sa bon padma'i nang gnas pa'i //
T02D1854:26b-13: 'od kyis kyang ni phyag rgya lnga drangs nas //
T02D1854:26b-14: kha yi nang zhugs gsang ba'i dbus gnas te //
T02D1854:26b-15: zhu nas de las gzugs la sogs par gyur //
T02D1854:26b-16: sku rdor la sogs mtshan ma de lha mo //
T02D1854:26b-17: me long sogs gang yin de las byung spros //
T02D1854:26b-18: gzhan yang phyi rol me tog bdug spos sogs //
T02D1854:26b-19: de rnams nam mkha' la ni gdugs bzhin gyur //
T02D1854:26b-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dang /
T02D1854:26b-21: p'u dza la sogs sgra yi sngags brjod cing //
T02D1854:26b-22: mi bskyod rdo rje la sogs tshigs bcad lnga //
T02D1854:26b-23: brjod nas de nas mdun du rnam bsam pa //
T02D1854:26b-24: yam las byung ba'i 'od sngo nag zhur byas nyid //
T02D1854:26b-25: rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan rlung gi dkyil 'khor la //
T02D1854:26b-26: de nas ram byung shin tu mdog dmar ba'i //
T02D1854:26b-27: gru gsum gyen gnas me yi tshogs kyis mnan //
T02D1854:26b-28: de nas me yi steng du 'od dmar aom //
T02D1854:26b-29: de las byung ba'i padma'i snod mchog bsam //
T02D1854:26b-30: rnam pa bco lnga'i rdzas kyis yongs gang ba'i //
T02D1854:26b-31: bdud rtsi lnga la sa bon lnga rnams kyis //
T02D1854:26b-32: aom h'um zla ba gnyis ni mkha' dkyil gnas //
T02D1854:26b-33: zhugs nas de yi nang du lhung bar gyur //
T02D1854:26b-34: skol bas aom ni tshur gyur kun du blta //
T02D1854:26b-35: h'um gi sa bon las byung rdo rje nang //
T02D1854:26b-36: rdo rjes dkrugs par rnam par zhu gyur pa //
T02D1854:26b-37: yi ge h'um bzlas ye shes bdud rtsir gyur //
T02D1854:26b-38: de las gzhan pa yi ni snod rnams kun //
T02D1854:26b-39: thams cad rang gi lag na thogs par spro //
T02D1854:26b-40: lce yi rtse mor h'um byung rdo rje dkar //
T02D1854:26b-41: snying la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rgyal //
T02D1854:26b-42: thams cad kun du tshim par bsam par bya //
T02D1854:26b-43: dkyil 'khor dam pa'i mchog 'gyur ting 'dzin to //
T02D1854:26b-44: gang yang 'jam dbyangs rdo rje thugs ka yi //
T02D1854:27a-0: sems dpa'i snying po las byung 'jam @27a * //
T02D1854:27a-2: mam las byung ba'i sems kyi me bsgoms te //
T02D1854:27a-3: rdo rje gsum sku dang yang mnyam por byung //
T02D1854:27a-4: de rnams snying gnas rang mtshan sa bon las //
T02D1854:27a-5: byung nas ye shes 'od zer rab gsal ba'i //
T02D1854:27a-6: 'od kyis ma lus sna tshogs kun du gang //
T02D1854:27a-7: ye shes bdud rtsi rgyun gyi rjes song nas //
T02D1854:27a-8: 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad bsgral nas kyang //
T02D1854:27a-9: rnal 'byor bdud rtsi gzhan dang gzhan bsdus nas //
T02D1854:27a-10: 'og tu gdong bltas nas ni de byung bas //
T02D1854:27a-11: skad cig gis ni 'jig rten gsum bcas rgyal //
T02D1854:27a-12: ma lus sna tshogs sangs rgyas nyid byas nas //
T02D1854:27a-13: 'ongs nas spyi bo'i nang du rab tu zhugs //
T02D1854:27a-14: lus kun tshim par kun du gyur nas ni //
T02D1854:27a-15: thang cig de la yang ba'i rang bzhin gyur //
T02D1854:27a-16: de nyid gsum mchod cho ga bzhin du bya //
T02D1854:27a-17: mam gyi nang du rab zhugs rnam par blta //
T02D1854:27a-18: mam las byung gyur ral gri dbus su ni //
T02D1854:27a-19: zla gnas tsa na ka tsam thig ler gnas //
T02D1854:27a-20: de dbus dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po //
T02D1854:27a-21: nyi shur gcig gis ma tshang de rnams dag / gang dang gang gis skyo med de bsgoms te //
T02D1854:27a-22: mngon sum byas na thig le'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1854:27a-23: rang lha'i sa bon las byung 'od 'phros pas //
T02D1854:27a-24: phyi rol gyi ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams //
T02D1854:27a-25: chos 'byung zhes bya'i sna yi rtse mor zhugs //
T02D1854:27a-26: yang dag byang chub sems byung 'jam ral gyi //
T02D1854:27a-27: yang na 'khor lo padma rdo rje'am //
T02D1854:27a-28: nas kyi tshad dam zla ba'i dbus su ni //
T02D1854:27a-29: de yi steng du mam byung mdog lnga pa'i //
T02D1854:27a-30: yungs kar tshad tsam rin chen zur brgyad pa //
T02D1854:27a-31: rin chen dbus su ram byas 'khor lo nyid //
T02D1854:27a-32: gang yin de gyur rnal 'byor shes mchog gis //
T02D1854:27a-33: rdo rje sogs mtshan de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi //
T02D1854:27a-34: de rnams nyin dang mtshan ma spro bar bya //
T02D1854:27a-35: mtshan ma brtan por byas pas brtags na ni //
T02D1854:27a-36: 'od zer du ba'i 'od dang de bzhin gzhan //
T02D1854:27a-37: me khyer 'od dang snang ba chen po ste //
T02D1854:27a-38: rim gyis mthar thug phra mo'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1854:27a-39: rngub pa dang ni gnas dang ring du gyur //
T02D1854:27a-40: sdud dang gang pa dang ni 'dzin pa rnams //
T02D1854:27a-41: 'ong ba dang ni rjes dran sngon grub rnams //
T02D1854:27a-42: srog ma bsdams par gyur pa gang yin dge / aom dang dbugs de mnyam du nang du zhugs //
T02D1854:27a-43: a'a: yi sngags dang thabs cig dbus na gnas //
T02D1854:27a-44: h'um gi mthar ni rang gi sgra dang ldan //
T02D1854:27a-45: bzlas pa rkan dang mchu sbyar spang bar bya //
T02D1854:27b-0: @27b de nyid sa bon las 'dir sangs rgyas spro //
T02D1854:27b-1: 'od zer tshogs de nam mkhar song nas kyang //
T02D1854:27b-2: de nas byung ba'i lha mo de rnams kyis //
T02D1854:27b-3: dam tshig ces bya'i 'khor la mchod par byed //
T02D1854:27b-4: thams cad kun du 'khyud par gyur pa dang //
T02D1854:27b-5: dga' ba dag gis sangs rgyas rnams 'khyud 'gyur //
T02D1854:27b-6: de nas rang byas snying ga'i sems rdo rje //
T02D1854:27b-7: skad cig de la thub dbang zhugs par blta //
T02D1854:27b-8: gal te bsgoms dang bzlas pas skyo gyur na //
T02D1854:27b-9: rang gi snying ga'i de nyid rnam bsgoms pas //
T02D1854:27b-10: rig ma'i tshogs 'ongs nas ni glu yi sgras //
T02D1854:27b-11: de dang de yis 'khor lo mchog sad byas //
T02D1854:27b-12: mgo bo spags pa'i mtho gang tsam du ni //
T02D1854:27b-13: ma lus yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba dgod //
T02D1854:27b-14: bdud rtsi lnga rnams aom dang ldan pa ni //
T02D1854:27b-15: zhu bas skad cig de la rang lus bab //
T02D1854:27b-16: bsam bya gangs chu bsil 'dra bab gyur pas //
T02D1854:27b-17: ma lus skyo ba rnam par bsal bar bya //
T02D1854:27b-18: de nas thang cig de yis ngal sos nas //
T02D1854:27b-19: slar yang de yi gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya //
T02D1854:27b-20: gong du bshad pa'i dbang bskur mchod pa dang //
T02D1854:27b-21: bstod pa la sogs smon lam mthar thug brjod //
T02D1854:27b-22: byas nas gang dag gang rigs rab 'byung ba'i //
T02D1854:27b-23: de ni de dang de yi snying gar gzhug / de nyid gsum tshig gis ni byin brlab bya //
T02D1854:27b-24: gnas nas thogs med ye shes gnyis med tshul //
T02D1854:27b-25: de la gshegs gsol gleng gzhi de rnams ni //
T02D1854:27b-26: las rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin no //
T02D1854:27b-27: de las langs nas ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis //
T02D1854:27b-28: bdag nyid chen por rang lha'i rnam pa gzung //
T02D1854:27b-29: snang ba tsam du yul de mthong nas ni //
T02D1854:27b-30: sku sogs rdo rje bdag nyid dngos rnams dag / rang gi sa bon las byung yongs rdzogs pa'i //
T02D1854:27b-31: 'khor lo rang gi snying gar zhugs par bsam //
T02D1854:27b-32: ram las byung ba'i me yang bsgom par bya //
T02D1854:27b-33: zan zar gyur pa'i tshe na 'di skad gsungs //
T02D1854:27b-34: sngar bshad rlung dang me dang dgod dbus su //
T02D1854:27b-35: rdo rje la sogs cho ga bzhin byas nas //
T02D1854:27b-36: sku sogs lha rnams kun du tshim par bya //
T02D1854:27b-37: nang gi bdag nyid kyis ni sbyin sreg las //
T02D1854:27b-38: mthar thug par yang sems kyi bya ba ste //
T02D1854:27b-39: phung po la sogs bud shing kun dang ldan //
T02D1854:27b-40: ye shes me 'bar ba yis phung po ni //
T02D1854:27b-41: bsregs pa gang yin de ni bzla med bshad //
T02D1854:27b-42: ma lus 'dod pa yi ni cho ga nyid //
T02D1854:28a-0: de yis rang gi lha yi rnam @28a * //
T02D1854:28a-2: rang dang gzhan lus la yang kun du mchod //
T02D1854:28a-3: sangs rgyas rnams bsten dam tshig shin tu thob //
T02D1854:28a-4: rjes su mthun pa'i 'gro ba'i don byas shing //
T02D1854:28a-5: de bzhin gshegs rnams kun du mchod par bsam //
T02D1854:28a-6: sems ni gcig tu mnyam par gzhag gyur pas //
T02D1854:28a-7: lus la sogs pa'i las rnams rtag tu bya //
T02D1854:28a-8: gang yang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las //
T02D1854:28a-9: dga' bas thams cad nyin mtshan rab byed pa //
T02D1854:28a-10: de yi sngags dang phyag rgya rab brtags par //
T02D1854:28a-11: sangs rgyas mchog rnams kyis ni rab tu gsungs //
T02D1854:28a-12: ji ltar dngos po gcig la rnam par rtog / dpag med 'byung 'gyur bud med mthong ba las //
T02D1854:28a-13: khyi dang 'dod pa can dang rab byung gsum //
T02D1854:28a-14: bde dang sdug bsngal rnam par grol ba'i sems //
T02D1854:28a-15: lus la sogs pa'i dge dang mi dge'i las //
T02D1854:28a-16: gang phyir de ni sems kyi dbang gis gsungs / de bas rtag tu rnam rtog dra gcod pa'i //
T02D1854:28a-17: sems ni nag po'i las su mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1854:28a-18: dam tshig nyams pas kham las byung ba yi //
T02D1854:28a-19: snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje yis bkod pa //
T02D1854:28a-20: kham las byung ba'i ral gri de nyid steng //
T02D1854:28a-21: sa bon 'di las byung ba'i don yod grub //
T02D1854:28a-22: sna tshogs padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa yi //
T02D1854:28a-23: gong gi go rims nyid bzhin thams cad bya //
T02D1854:28a-24: myur du dbang bskur bas ni nyes kun dang //
T02D1854:28a-25: 'gro ba rang bzhin gyis ni dag par blta //
T02D1854:28a-26: phyi rol khrus la'ang cho ga 'dis bya'o //
T02D1854:28a-27: gang zhig thun mtshams nyams par gyur pa yis //
T02D1854:28a-28: des kyang cho ga 'di ni bya ba ste //
T02D1854:28a-29: ji lta ba bzhin nyes pa gsum 'byung gsungs //
T02D1854:28a-30: gang yang sna tshogs padma'i dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D1854:28a-31: h'um las byung ba yi ni bgegs mthar byed //
T02D1854:28a-32: bdud rtsi zhes bya khor lo dbang bskur bas //
T02D1854:28a-33: 'bad pas bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom bya ste //
T02D1854:28a-34: de ltar ting 'dzin gsum po bsgom bdag nyid //
T02D1854:28a-35: gang bsgoms pas ni shin tu skyo gyur nas //
T02D1854:28a-36: 'khor lo rang snying nang zhugs rnam par bsam //
T02D1854:28a-37: rnal 'byor ldan pas rig mar ldan par nyal //
T02D1854:28a-38: rnal 'byor gnyid log ldang ba'i dus su ni //
T02D1854:28a-39: lha mo'i tshogs kyis blangs pa'i glu yi sgras //
T02D1854:28a-40: myur bar kun du langs nas yang byas te //
T02D1854:28a-41: sngar bshad pa yi mnyam par gzhag par bya //
T02D1854:28a-42: dngos grub mtshan ma nye bar brtags nas ni //
T02D1854:28b-0: @28b khang bzangs ngos gnyis nas ni 'dzeg pa dang //
T02D1854:28b-1: dag pa'i gtsug lag khang dang sangs rgyas sku //
T02D1854:28b-2: rmi lam gzhon nu ma dang rgyal po mthong //
T02D1854:28b-3: de nyid gsum gyi cho ga bzhin mchod nas //
T02D1854:28b-4: dngos grub 'dod pa yis ni dkyil 'khor bya //
T02D1854:28b-5: rig pa 'dzin dang ri lu mig sman dang //
T02D1854:28b-6: bcud kyis len pa'am phyag rgya che la sogs //
T02D1854:28b-7: rta dang gser dang rin chen sa gzhi 'gro //
T02D1854:28b-8: khrag dang bu dang bu mo du ma byin //
T02D1854:28b-9: bskal pa grangs med gsum la sogs pa yis //
T02D1854:28b-10: 'di ru la las sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur //
T02D1854:28b-11: gang yang bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02D1854:28b-12: thams cad bsgoms pas bde bar nyer bsgoms nas //
T02D1854:28b-13: de steng sdig pa kun las rnam grol nas //
T02D1854:28b-14: skad cig gis te rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur //
T02D1854:28b-15: bdag gis man ngag brtsams 'di rab dad pas //
T02D1854:28b-16: bla ma'i zhal gyi padma las rnyed de //
T02D1854:28b-17: mkhas pa rnams kyis 'di la ltad mo gyis //
T02D1854:28b-18: 'gro ba kun la phan phyir bdag gis byas //
T02D1854:28b-19: ji ltar log pa'i brdzun gyis byas pa yis //
T02D1854:28b-20: pha yi drung nas cung zad rnyed pa ltar //
T02D1854:28b-21: de bzhin bdag gis bsod nams cung zad rnyed //
T02D1854:28b-22: de nas 'jig rten 'jam pa'i rdo rjer shog / dpal ldan au rgyan yul du brten skyes shing //
T02D1854:28b-23: dpag med rgyud don ma lus rab mkhyen pa //
T02D1854:28b-24: dpal ldan rnam par dul zhi'i zhal snga nas //
T02D1854:28b-25: de yis dbang bskur slob ma'i gtso bo mchog / de las sin dh'u'i ngos su de skyes shing //
T02D1854:28b-26: rnam thos bsti gnas zhes bshad rgyal bzhugs nas //
T02D1854:28b-27: sh'akya'i bshes gnyen bdag nyid sangs rgyas shing //
T02D1854:28b-28: de yis yongs bkrol zhal gyi man ngag go //
T02D1854:28b-29: dpal ldan au rgyan yul nas byung ba'i sangs rgyas
T02D1854:28b-30: ye shes zhabs kyi zhal snga nas kyi sgrub thabs
